DOC.brief_summary: Is FemoSeal速 closure device safer comfortable manual compression femoral artery access closure coronary angiography ?
DOC.brief_title: Comparison FemoSeal速 Arterial Closure Device Manual Compression After Coronary Angiography
DOC.detailed_description: Access site complication coronary angiography still challenge everyday practice . The FemoSeal速 closure device proven safe show swedish SCAAR registry . This study aim investigate , randomize design , FemoSeal速 advantage safety efficacy manual compression .
DOC.criteria: The patient must least 18 year old Patients undergoing femoral access coronary angiography Patient must competent provide informed , write consent Only 6F sheath Percutaneous coronary intervention Intra coronary measurement ( FFR , IVUS , OCT , NIR ) Groin hematoma closure Pseudoaneurysm AV fistula Significant stenosis ilial femoral artery Prior peripheral artery surgery INR > 3,0 Platelet count < 120 million per millilitre blood Coagulopathy ( bleed disorder ) Thrombolysis last 24h Planned heparin infusion procedure Pregnancy Uncontrolled hypertension > 200 mmHg / 110 mmHg Femoral access device closure last 30 day
